ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the business number field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Business_Number__c ) && NOT(ISNULL(Business_Number__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Business_Number__c)) && !REGEX(Business_Number__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Business_Number__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Business_Number__c)) && !REGEX(Business_Number__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for business number. The minimum number of digits should be 10
